arts.ttl: Pulisic misses penalty as Juve and Milan draw
arts.sum: Christian Pulisic missed a penalty as AC Milan and Juventus played out a goalless draw at the Allianz Stadium.

arts.ttl: Juventus 0 – Milan 0 | Allegri’s press conference: “The team did well…”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri, Milan’s coach, spoke at the press conference after Juventus - Milan, which ended in a goalless draw. Any regrets? “The positive is that we didn’t concede and we played a good game, reading it well, especially in the first half when we had little space. In the second half we grew a lot […]

arts.ttl: Allegri after Juventus 0-0 Milan: ‘Leao must learn to be ruthless, We should have killed the game’
arts.sum: Milan coach Massimiliano Allegri admitted frustration after his side’s 0-0 draw with Juventus at the...

arts.ttl: Juventus 0 – Milan 0 | Allegri: “We need to be ruthless in certain moments”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN after Juventus-Milan ended 0-0. These are his words: On Christian Pulisic’s penalty: “I didn’t even see how he took it… Penalties are missed. We had a balanced first half, they were good at closing spaces, and our ball circulation was very slow, but above all, our midfielders didn’t attack the […]

arts.ttl: ‘Aiming to win’ – Gabbia admits Milan dressing room ‘wasn’t happy’ after Juventus draw
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Matteo Gabbia has admitted that the AC Milan dressing room is not a happy one after the draw against Juventus. Milan’s five-game winning run across all competitions was ended on Sunday night at the Allianz Stadium by Juventus in a 0-0 draw, with some positives to take from the game but also some bitterness too. […] The post ‘Aiming to win’ – Gabbia admits Milan dressing room ‘wasn’t happy’ after Juventus draw appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Allegri says Milan ‘should have won’ against Juve amid misses: “Leao has to score”
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri spoke to the media after AC Milan’s 0-0 draw against Juventus, echoing that the Rossoneri should have got more from the game. It ended up being a rather cagey affair at Allianz Stadium as Milan and Juventus both preferred to defend low, without giving too much away. That said, the Rossoneri had some […] The post Allegri says Milan ‘should have won’ against Juve amid misses: “Leao has to score” appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Juve 0 – Milan 0 | Kalulu: “Milan are lucky not to have European games”
arts.sum: Pierre Kalulu, Juventus defender, spoke at a press conference after Juventus-Milan. Another draw… “It was a tough match against a very confident, strong opponent. Both sides had chances to score. We are not satisfied with this point, but we have to take it and focus on the next game.” Do you like playing as a […]

arts.ttl: Rabiot ‘angry’ as Milan should have ‘done more’ vs. Juventus: “We dropped two points”
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Adrien Rabiot believes that AC Milan dropped two points against Juventus, insisting that everyone in the team must do more. Milan’s winning run came to an end on Sunday night at the Allianz Stadium against Juventus, though their impressive defensive record did continue as the spoils were shared after a 0-0 stalemate.
